1 #include <google/protobuf/io/coded_stream.h>
2 #include <google/protobuf/io/zero_copy_stream.h>

9 namespace utils {
10 bool readProtoMsgCountToStream(std::fstream* stream_in, uint32_t* message_count,
11  uint32_t* byte_offset) {
12  CHECK_NOTNULL(stream_in);
13  CHECK_NOTNULL(message_count);
14  CHECK_NOTNULL(byte_offset);
15  CHECK(stream_in->is_open());
16  stream_in->clear();
17  stream_in->seekg(*byte_offset, std::ios::beg);
18  google::protobuf::io::IstreamInputStream raw_in(stream_in);
19  google::protobuf::io::CodedInputStream coded_in(&raw_in);
20  const int prev_position = coded_in.CurrentPosition();
21  if (!coded_in.ReadVarint32(message_count)) {
22  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not read message size.";
23  return false;
24  }
25  *byte_offset += coded_in.CurrentPosition() - prev_position;
26  return true;
27 }
28 
29 bool writeProtoMsgCountToStream(uint32_t message_count,
30  std::fstream* stream_out) {
31  CHECK_NOTNULL(stream_out);
32  CHECK(stream_out->is_open());
33  stream_out->clear();
34  google::protobuf::io::OstreamOutputStream raw_out(stream_out);
35  google::protobuf::io::CodedOutputStream coded_out(&raw_out);
36  coded_out.WriteVarint32(message_count);
37  return true;
38 }

40 bool readProtoMsgFromStream(std::fstream* stream_in,
41  google::protobuf::Message* message,
42  uint32_t* byte_offset) {
43  CHECK_NOTNULL(stream_in);
44  CHECK_NOTNULL(message);
45  CHECK_NOTNULL(byte_offset);
46  CHECK(stream_in->is_open());
47 
48  stream_in->clear();
49  stream_in->seekg(*byte_offset, std::ios::beg);
50  google::protobuf::io::IstreamInputStream raw_in(stream_in);
51  google::protobuf::io::CodedInputStream coded_in(&raw_in);
52 
53  const int prev_position = coded_in.CurrentPosition();
54 
55  uint32_t message_size;
56  if (!coded_in.ReadVarint32(&message_size)) {
57  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not read protobuf message size.";
58  return false;
59  }
60 
61  if (message_size == 0u) {
62  LOG(ERROR) << "Empty protobuf message!";
63  return false;
64  }
65  google::protobuf::io::CodedInputStream::Limit limit =
66  coded_in.PushLimit(message_size);
67  if (!message->ParseFromCodedStream(&coded_in)) {
68  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not parse stream.";
69  return false;
70  }
71  if (!coded_in.ConsumedEntireMessage()) {
72  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not consume protobuf message.";
73  return false;
74  }
75  coded_in.PopLimit(limit);
76  *byte_offset += coded_in.CurrentPosition() - prev_position;
77  return true;
78 }
79 
80 bool writeProtoMsgToStream(const google::protobuf::Message& message,
81  std::fstream* stream_out) {
82  CHECK_NOTNULL(stream_out);
83  CHECK(stream_out->is_open());
84  google::protobuf::io::OstreamOutputStream raw_out(stream_out);
85  google::protobuf::io::CodedOutputStream coded_out(&raw_out);
86  const uint32_t size_bytes = message.ByteSize();
87  coded_out.WriteVarint32(size_bytes);
88  uint8_t* buffer = coded_out.GetDirectBufferForNBytesAndAdvance(size_bytes);
89  if (buffer != nullptr) {
90  message.SerializeWithCachedSizesToArray(buffer);
91  } else {
92  message.SerializeWithCachedSizes(&coded_out);
93  if (coded_out.HadError()) {
94  return false;
95  }
96  }
97 
98  return true;
99 }
